text: Ahmad Sadegh-Bonab () is an Iranian politician. He was for a short time the Minister of Roads and Transportation after Ahmad Khorram, the former Minister was impeached by the Majlis on October 3, 2004. Before the post of the supervisor of the ministry, Sadegh-Bonab has been a Vice Minister of Roads and Transportation and the Iranian Ambassador to Ukraine. == References == Category:Iranian Vice Ministers Category:Ambassadors of Iran to Ukraine Category:Living people Category:Government ministers of Iran Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Recipients of the Order of Service
title: Ahmad Sadegh-Bonab
